Name: Application for the Review of a Premises Licence or a Club Premises Certificate PDF
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","name":"Application for the Review of a Premises Licence or a Club Premises Certificate PDF","remove_margins":"","setPaperType":"a4","content":"

Application for the Review of a Premises Licence or a Club Premises Certificate

Reference: {case_ref}

Before completing this form please read the Review of a Premises Licence or Club Premises Certificate guidance notes.

1. The ground(s) for review must be based on one or more of the licensing objectives.
2. Please list any additional information or details, for example dates or problems which are included in the grounds for review, if available.
3. The application form must be signed.
4. An applicant agent (for example a solicitor) may sign on their behalf provided that they have actual authority to do so.
5. This is the address to which we shall use to correspond with you about this application.

 
I, {applicantName},
apply for the review of a {reviewOf}
@af:if({reviewOf} = "premises licence")

Part 1 - Premises Details

Does the premises have a postal address?: {postalAddress}
 
Ordnance Survey reference or description:
{#ordnanceSurvey}
 
Premises Address
Flat number (if any) {premisesAddress/flatNumber}
House number / name {premisesAddress/houseNumber}
Road name {premisesAddress/streetName}
Town {premisesAddress/townName}
County {premisesAddress/countyName}
Post Code {premisesAddress/postcode_search}
 
Name of premises licence holder (if known): {licenceHolderName}
 
Number of premises licence (if known): {licenceNumber}
@endaf:if @af:if({reviewOf} = "club premises certificate")

Part 1 - Club Premises Details

Does the club premises have a postal address?: {postalAddressClub}
 
Ordnance Survey reference or description:
{#ordnanceSurvey2}
 
Club Premises Address
Flat number (if any) {clubAddress/flatNumber}
House number / name {clubAddress/houseNumber}
Road name {clubAddress/streetName}
Town {clubAddress/townName}
County {clubAddress/countyName}
Post Code {clubAddress/postcode_search}
 
Name of club premises certificate holder (if known): {certificateHolder}
 
Number of club premises certificate (if known): {certificateNumber}
@endaf:if

Part 2 - Applicant Details

I am: {iAm}
 
@af:if({iAm} = "1")
I am: {iAm1}
 
@endaf:if

Details of Individual Applicant or Responsible Authority Applicant or Individual Applicant

Title: {titleIndividual}
First name: {firstNameIndividual}
Surname: {surnameIndividual}
 
Name: {nameOfBody}
 
Address
Flat number (if any) {address/flatNumber}
House number / name {address/houseNumber}
Road name {address/streetName}
Town {address/townName}
County {address/countyName}
Post Code {address/postcode_search}
 
Telephone number: {telephoneIndividual}
Email address: {emailIndividual/emailAddress}
I am aged 18 years or over: {age18Confirm}
This application to review relates to the following licensing objective(s):
{#licensingObjectives}
 
Please state ground(s) for review (please read guidance note 1):
{#groundsForReview}
 
Please provide as much information as possible to support the application (please read guidance note 2):
{#supportInfo}
 
Have you made an application for review relating to this premises before?: {applicationBefore}
If yes, please state the date of that application: {applicationBeforeDate}
 
If you have made representations before relating to this premises, please state what they were and when you made them:
{#representationsBefore}
 
I understand that copies of this application will be sent by the licensing authority to the responsible authorities and the premises licence holder or club holding the club premises certificate: {understand}
 
IT IS AN OFFENCE, LIABLE ON CONVICTION TO A FINE UP TO LEVEL 5 ON THE STANDARD SCALE, UNDER SECTION 158 OF THE LICENSING ACT 2003, TO MAKE A FALSE STATEMENT IN OR IN CONNECTION WITH THIS APPLICATION.

Part 3 - Signatures

Signature of applicant or applicant's solicitor or other duly authorised agent. (Please read guidance note 4). If signing on behalf of the applicant, please state in what capacity.
 
Signature: {signatureName}
Date: {signatureDate}
Capacity: {signatureCapacity}
 
Is the correspondence name and address associated with this application different that which has already been given? (see guidance note 5): {addressDiff}
 
@af:if({addressDiff} = "yes")
Correspondence name: {correspondenceName}
 
Correspondence Address
Flat number (if any) {correspondenceAddress/flatNumber}
House number / name {correspondenceAddress/houseNumber}
Road name {correspondenceAddress/streetName}
Town {correspondenceAddress/townName}
County {correspondenceAddress/countyName}
Post Code {correspondenceAddress/postcode_search}
 
Correspondence telephone number: {correspondenceTelephone}
Correspondence email address: {correspondenceEmail/emailAddress}
 
@endaf:if
Please note: You must serve a copy of the application on the licence holder on the day that you made the application.
 
The Licensing Authority will also serve a copy of the application to each Responsible Authority.
